Dialogue.Page: Maaan. I'm all outta firewood now.
Guess that's all the islands getting on the Gabbro Relaxation Scale this trip.
But hey - looks like this second campfire's already faring much better than the first one I built down there!
Should be safe up here from any more random waves washing up onto the shore and putting out my poor campfire, at least.
That was a pretty horrible experience - closing my eyes around a warm campfire, and waking up cold and soaking wet..
Well, colder and wetter than I already was.
I should probably just count my lucky stars that I woke up before those waves carried me off the island with them..
Stars above.. As if those roaring cyclones waking me up every time I'm about to nod off weren't enough. You sure know how to make sleeping hard, Giant's Deep.
No wonder Hornfels suggested I should come to this planet!
